name: TUGA
description:
--- △ ---

Secret Santa 2021

Dear Santa,

           I like RPGs and platformers (It's very cool) so I would like to have one of the two. Please make a game that runs in the browser, because I have Mac.

Thanks.

PS: My favourite RPG is Pokemon X and Y
PPS: My favourite platformer is Super Mario Bros
PPPS: In RPGs I like when story isn't that classic history about a warrior that wants to get the princess, but in platformers I dont mind classic stories.

--- ▽ ---

A platformer with some basic quests and collectables.
WSAD movement | Space to Jump | F to interact.

Things that didn't get finished: combat, sound effects, music, multiple levels.
Maybe one day.

Enjoy.
